name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 26, the Beijing News reported that villagers in a farmer cooperative in Henan Province have been unable to withdraw their 10 million yuan in deposits since May 2023. It is reported that the cooperative was opened by an individual.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Up master epcdiy posted a video saying that the Sogou input method that comes with the Chinese version of Samsung phones will send the user's input data to the input method developer through post, while the Sogou input method version downloaded from the official website will send this data through HTTPS encryption.
At the same time, in the video, Up master gave suggestions on how to prevent the input method from taking away privacy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 27, during the live broadcast of Henan Radio and Television Station’s People’s Livelihood Channel, Henan Village and Township Bank depositors collectively swiped the screen.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 27, migrant workers in Hengyang City, Hunan Province jumped off a building to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution: The daily work of a train driver

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 27, Nanyang, Henan.
Many local netizens reported on social media that they had waited for a long time at the bus station but could not see the bus.
According to a local driver, the reason for the suspension of the bus service was that the bus company owed gas money to the gas station, causing the vehicle to run out of gas and unable to run normally.
Some netizens left comments in the comment area saying that the drivers had not received their wages for several years, and the provident fund had been owed for a year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Let Palu learn to be grateful"
A player of "Phantom Beast Palu" has summarized the "Palu Bible", each of which is the current situation of workers.
"However, the Palu in the game is just a group of data streams disguised as cute characters, and you, my friend, you are the real Palu."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 26, students at Guangxi Hezhou No. 1 Senior High School posted big-character posters everywhere in the college because they were dissatisfied with the school's deprivation of their winter vacation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 25, it was reported online that students at the No. 9 Foreign Language School in Baotou, Inner Mongolia, protested on campus because they were dissatisfied with the school's decision to postpone the winter vacation originally scheduled for January 27 to February 3. Since mobile phones are prohibited in the school, no protest footage has been leaked.
The school has compromised and announced a holiday on the 26th.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Jiangsu students' submissions
Due to the large number of students who committed suicide in Jiangsu recently, schools in Jiangsu have closed on time this year and no longer provide make-up classes as in previous years.
However, this behavior has aroused the dissatisfaction of many parents, who believe that the long vacation has delayed their children's studies. Parents in Xinghua City are planning to go to the school to protest and pressure the school to resume classes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
From January 25 to 26, citizens went to the Xinyu fire scene to send flowers. Some people brought fried chicken and cola, which young people love to eat.
The owner of a flower shop 800 meters away from the scene said that many people came to buy flowers to mourn the victims of the fire in the past two days. The card placed on the flowers at the scene read: Dear baby, rest in peace, may there be no pain in heaven.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 26, Xinyu residents went to the fire scene to mourn the dead.
The scene was blocked by green iron sheets.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
When the fire broke out, Chen Ming, who was attending classes at the institution, sent a heartbreaking 3-second video to his mother Chen Hong at the last moment of his life.
He hurriedly sent messages to his mother, "It's on fire," "I can't get out," "Mom." These were the last messages he left for Chen Hong.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 26, No. 120 Middle School in Shenyang, Liaoning. The students’ green uniforms prompted netizens to joke, “We’ve already become more affectionate.”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 26, 2024, the investigation report on the Yinchuan barbecue restaurant's particularly serious gas accident was released, and 66 public officials were held accountable.
On June 21, 2023, a particularly serious gas explosion occurred at Fuyang Barbecue Restaurant in Yinchuan, Ningxia, killing 31 people and injuring 7 people.
